articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Humans are finding guidance in these dark times by talking to AI-powered versions of the world’s biggest religious figures. We only have one question.
articles.title: People Are Now Worshiping AI Gods—But There’s Only One Thing We Want to Know

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Each hotspot on the crypto wireless network is now represented by an NFT as Helium successfully migrates to Solana.
articles.title: Helium Completes Solana Migration, Minting Nearly 1M NFTs in the Process

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Gadget-Bot’s Peggy Chung and Robert Simons are bringing their Kaidro webcomic to life as a Web3 game and animated TV series.
articles.title: Call of Duty, Apex Legends Veterans Reveal Kaidro Web3 Game on Immutable

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Developers now have the ability to deploy the Space and Time Web3 data warehouse directly from Microsoft’s cloud computing service Azure.
articles.title: Space and Time Adds Blockchain Data to Microsoft's Azure Marketplace

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: European Union politicians debated the bloc’s landmark Markets in Crypto Assets regulation ahead of Thursday’s vote.
articles.title: MiCA Will Mark End of Crypto 'Wild West': EU Lawmakers

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The cash infusion will help the crypto league launch Karate Combat apps on iOS and Android.
articles.title: Karate Combat Secures $18 Million for Crypto-Driven Martial Arts

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The popular Bitcoin privacy-preserving technique is now available on Trezor hardware wallets.
articles.title: Crypto Wallet Firm Trezor Adds Privacy-Enhancing 'CoinJoin' Feature to Bitcoin Transactions

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The Final Fantasy developer is continuing its push into Web3 via the Elixir launcher, which already offers an Epic Games Store integration.
articles.title: Square Enix Teams With Elixir to Bring Web3 Games to Mainstream Audiences

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: A memecoin investor has turned $250 into $1.02 million—but liquidity issues could prevent them from realizing that profit.
articles.title: PEPE Holder Turns $250 into $1M in Four Days. But Can They Sell It?

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Bitcoin dropped to just over $29,000 overnight, while Ethereum slumped by 6% on the day to slip below $2,000.
articles.title: Over $250 Million in Liquidations as Bitcoin, Ethereum Slip

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) as a concept dates back to ancient times, but modern AI began in the mid-20th century with pioneers like Alan Turing.
articles.title: A Brief History of Artificial Intelligence (AI): From Turing to IoT

articles.author: Shuyao Kong
articles.description: Hong Kong has historically provided fertile soil to grow financial institutions. Can it also make magic for crypto firms?
articles.title: Hong Kong Is Vying To Be The Next Crypto Hub

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The NFT artist announced the Western Art Dept, an initiative to bring more traditional Western-themed artists into the Web3 space.
articles.title: New Frontiers: Jeremy Booth Lassos More Western Artists Into Web3

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A hacker has been targeting OG crypto users since December, draining their wallets and leaving experts baffled.
articles.title: A Hacker Has Stolen $10 Million in Ethereum and No One Knows How

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: AI revives Oasis’ distinctive sound, raising complicated questions about the intersection of creativity and technology.
articles.title: AI Oasis Tribute Album Sparks Debate Over Copyright and the Future of Music

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Years before the SEC labeled it a security, Gensler called Algorand “great technology” and “brilliant work.”
articles.title: Did Gary Gensler Pull a Kim Kardashian by 'Shilling' Algorand?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: GOP lawmakers blasted the SEC Chairman today during a hearing, with Rep. Tom Emmer (R-MN) the most scathing.
articles.title: Gensler Is Driving Crypto to Communist China, Says Republican Congressman

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: The more influential Bitcoin becomes, the greater the risk of attack.
articles.title: This Upgrade Could Make It Harder for Governments to Censor Bitcoin

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Trump wants “‘NICE GUY’ CREDIT” after dropping more $99 NFTs, but his first set of collectibles have fallen by over 50% on the secondary market.
articles.title: Trump Drops More NFTs—And Now the First Batch Is Plummeting in Price

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The letter accuses the agency boss of cramming the digital assets industry into an improper regulatory framework.
articles.title: Lack of Crypto Compliance Is SEC's Fault, Say Republican Lawmakers

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Award-winning photographer Jeremy Cowart will produce the NFTs live in Nashville, in partnership with OpenSea and Transient Labs.
articles.title: Jeremy Cowart to Create 10,000 Photo NFTs in 20 Minutes—In Front of an Audience

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: GALA holders are scheduled for an airdrop in May but should be wary of keeping their funds in exchanges, liquidity pools, or smart contracts.
articles.title: Gala v2 Airdrop Announced: What You Need to Know

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: A look at how AI can be used to take on—and improve—the optimization of a supply chain.
articles.title: How Artificial Intelligence Can Revolutionize Supply Chain Optimization

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Amid the latest crypto crackdown in the United States, Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong appears to be turning to the UK and Europe.
articles.title: UK ‘Moving Fast’ on Crypto Regulations, Says Coinbase CEO

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: A judge rejected Do Kwon's request to block SEC access to documents related to Terraform Labs’ activities in Singapore.
articles.title: SEC Granted Access to Singapore Records for Terra's Do Kwon

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The advent of accessible AI makes it easier than ever to create fake images. But AI language tools can also help debunk false information.
articles.title: Can AI Save Journalism From Fake News? Not Yet, But These Tools Can Help

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Mysten Labs CEO Evan Cheng says AI’s broad consumer appeal has VCs shifting gears.
articles.title: Crypto Bumped to the Back Seat as AI Investments Accelerate

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The “Our Force 1" collection will potentially consist of hundreds of thousands of virtual pairs of the brand’s iconic Air Force 1 sneaker.
articles.title: Nike Unveils First .Swoosh NFT Digital Sneaker Drop

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Paxful customers are angry that they still cannot withdraw their funds while the company's ex-boss claims otherwise.
articles.title: Paxful CEO Says Users Can Withdraw Funds—But They Say Otherwise

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Experts warn that AI could harm humans but also say the future may be brighter than we think.
articles.title: Google CEO: We’re Not Ready for Advanced AI

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: A legal expert said the coins’ inclusion resembles another SEC lawsuit brought against a former Coinbase employee.
articles.title: SEC Labels Algorand and Five Other Tokens as Securities in Bittrex Lawsuit

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The coffee giant will drop its second NFT collection this week, and teased the public rollout for its Web3 platform.
articles.title: Starbucks Odyssey Launch ‘Getting Closer’ With New NFTs, Rewards

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Big investors continue to feel optimistic about Bitcoin, according to a Monday CoinShares report, with over $104 million of inflows.
articles.title: Bitcoin Fund Inflows Top $100M in One Week as Investors 'Flee to Safety'

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The lawsuit also names six tokens as securities, including Algorand.
articles.title: SEC Charges Bittrex, Former CEO for Operating Unregistered Securities Exchange

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Politicians working on the EU’s response to AI development want the bloc to work with the U.S. on a "human-centric" solution.
articles.title: EU Lawmakers Call for 'Human-centric, Safe and Trustworthy' AI Development

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Scams continued to plague Australians in 2022, with crypto payments seeing a hefty uptick compared to the previous year.
articles.title: Australians Lost $148M in Crypto to Scammers in 2022

articles.description: Anthony Scaramucci of hedge fund SkyBridge Capital got burned by Sam Bankman-Fried: he co-hosted SALT conferences with FTX and sold a 30% stake in SkyBridge to FTX Ventures. And yet "The Mooch" tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott "I'm more bullish now than I have ever been" on crypto as an investment case. He discusses his frustration with SBF, how wrong he thinks politicians like Elizabeth Warren and Gary Gensler are about crypto and how to regulate it, what he sees happening next with adoption, and talks about Trump. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Anthony Scaramucci Is More Bullish on Bitcoin Than Ever

articles.description: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal discussed the "Howey Test," which the SEC uses as its yard stick for whether a crypto asset should be regulated as a security, and told Decrypt's Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts the issue with it isn't that it's old (the case is from 1946) but how it's being applied to modern technology. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer: The Problem With SEC's Howey Test Isn't Its Age

articles.description: Leo Matchett from Web3 film funding platform Decentralized Pictures tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA about DCP's just announced iPhone Filmmaking Initiative, which will support aspiring filmmakers who create a short film on their iPhones, and will be determined via DCP's crypto-native on-chain voting system.
articles.title: Decentralized Pictures Plots Its Next Web3 Grant for Filmmakers

articles.description: Web3 gaming YouTuber CryptoStache talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA about why Web3 gaming will bring NFTs mainstream, the partnerships that prove it's already happening, how gamers will change their tune on NFTs, and how the terminology is likely to change.
articles.title: Web3 YouTuber CryptoStache: Gaming Will Be the Catalyst That Takes NFTs Mainstream

articles.description: Steve H., VP of sales from Fordefi, which raised $18 million in funding last year, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA how Fordefi uses multi-party computation to make signing transactions on an institutional crypto wallet much simpler—no seed phrase needed.
articles.title: Fordefi Aims to Dramatically Simplify the Institutional Crypto Wallet

articles.description: Toronto-based Bitcoin mining company Hut 8 recently announced a merger with U.S. Bitcoin Corp that will take it into Texas, Nebraska, and New York. Hut 8 CEO Jaime Leverton joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk expanding into the U.S., dealing with regulatory pushback post-FTX, why Texas is such a hotspot, and where she'd like to expand globally down the road (the climates may surprise you). Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Canadian Bitcoin Miner Hut 8 Is Heading West

articles.description: Move over, DeFi—ReFi is coming? Gitcoin founder Kevin Owocki has stepped away from DeFi grant-giving machine Gitcoin as it fully decentralizes and is now focused on regenerative finance (huh?) and ReFi incubator Supermodular. He aims to "regenerate the regenerators." He explained it all to Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly, and also talks DAO structure, crypto factions, NFT use cases, his book "Greenpilled," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Kevin Owocki Wants to Regenerate DeFi

articles.description: Aurory executive producer and head of production Jonathan Campeau tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about how the first-generation of Web3 games came out of DeFi and are now evolving.
articles.title: Why Aurory's Head of Production Left Ubisoft for Web3

articles.description: With roughly 50 video games in its pipeline, Gala Games is all-in on Web3. Gala's President of Blockchain Jason Brink told Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about the studio's ethos and weighs in on the different approaches to Web3 gaming.
articles.title: 'We Don't Really Do the Corporate Thing Very Well' Says Jason Brink on Gala Games Approach

articles.description: Paul Grewal is the Chief Legal Officer at Coinbase and a former U.S. magistrate judge in Northern California. He gave Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott his candid takes on Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX, the SEC's crackdown on staking, the sanctioning of Tornado Cash, and more alpha on how Coinbase is approaching the current unfriendly US regulatory environment. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Coinbase's Top Lawyer Gets Real on SEC

articles.description: Rotten Tomatoes founder Patrick Lee, who has led companies at the intersection of technology and entertainment from Web1 to Web3, spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Outer Edge LA about the current state of decentralized gaming, film and television.
articles.title: The Founder of Rotten Tomatoes Says Web3 Entertainment Isn’t Nearly Entertaining Enough Yet

articles.description: Gnosis first launched in 2015 as a decentralized prediction market built on Ethereum. Now it's a DAO, a multi-sig wallet, a staking chain, and a vibrant community with its own GNO governance token. Co-founder and COO Friederike Ernst talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about the careful evolution of Gnosis, decentralization impostors, account abstraction, DeFi UX failures, why Ethereum is the "Manhattan of crypto," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: How Gnosis Has Endured and Evolved

articles.description: Justin Aversano, best known for his high-selling "Twin Flames" NFT photo series, joined Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward ahead of the upcoming L.A. exhibition for his new Ethereum NFT project "Smoke and Mirrors." He shared the wild inspiration behind the tarot-themed collection, and why—despite his growing profile—he opted not to exhibit at a major brand-name gallery.
articles.title: Justin Aversano's Inspiration for Tarot-Themed NFT Photo Series 'Smoke and Mirrors'

articles.description: Former "Call of Duty" developer Rob Bowling, now head of Midnight Society Studio, checked in with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC and shared some behind-the-scenes statistics on how players are enjoying "Deadrop." The game saw 90,000 player hours over the weekend, with 97 minutes average play time per player, and their community size tripled in just a few days.
articles.title: Midnight Society’s Rob Bowling Talks Deadrop Launch and Working With Dr. Disrespect
